title: Four Interesting Hand Made Road Bikes from Bespoked 2024
content:
A Super Acciaio from Condor, a Skinny from Scotland's Shand, a one-of-a-kind from Shrewsbury's Havren Frameworks and a Ltd Ed Curve Belgie from Melbourne, Australia - all in residence at Victoria Baths for Bespoked 2024

Read the full article at Four Interesting Hand Made Road Bikes from Bespoked 2024 on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
